creator: Anderson, John
title: Mission to the east coast of Sumatra, in MDCCCXXIII, under the direction of the government of Prince of Wales Island
source: Anderson, John: Mission to the east coast of Sumatra, in MDCCCXXIII, under the direction of the government of Prince of Wales Island  including historical and descriptive sketches of the country, an account of the commerce, population, and the manners and customs of the inhabitants, and a visit to the Batta Cannibal States in the interior.
